derivation: from a compound of G2411 (ἱερουργέω) and the base of G2041 (ἱερουργέω);
strongs_def: to be a temple-worker, i.e. officiate as a priest (figuratively)
outline:
1. to minister in the manner of a priest, minister in priestly service
    1. of those who defend the sanctity of the law by undergoing a violent death
    2. of the preaching of the gospel
